name: Coasin
description: The COASIN Group is a conglomerate of companies that integrate high added-value technological solutions and offer ICT services as outsourcing, integrally and vertically, to all industries, pursuant to ITIL standards. With over 40 years of experience and offices in Chile, Canada, Costa Rica, Argentina, and Peru, COASIN Group is made up of six companies: COASIN Business Solutions, COASIN Global Services, C2 Mining Solutions, C2 Labs, COASIN Instalaciones, and recently, COASIN Energy.
